mapper.insert: insert into auth.user (id, username, phone_number, password, register_time, register_ip, register_device_id, is_active) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{phoneNumber}, #{password}, #{registerTime}, #{registerIp}, #{registerDeviceId}, 1);
mapper.select: select * from auth.user where username = #{username} and is_active = 1;
select * from auth.user where phone_number = #{phoneNumber} and is_active = 1;
mapper.insert: insert into auth.log (uid, time, ip, device_id) VALUES (#{uid},#{time},#{ip},#{deviceId});
mapper.update: update auth.user set is_active = 0 where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select * from auth.user where id = #{id} and is_active = 1;
select count(*) from auth.user where register_device_id = #{deviceId} and is_active = 1;
